Rule.name: New Account Selector
Rule.Description:
AccountSelector Rules are used by the role modeler to automatically select a target account for provisioning when there are multiple candidates.
The return value is a Link instance that represents the selection. Value can be:
null - indicates that no automatic selection can be made
"prompt" - indicates that a separate account selector should be presented for the role
existing Link - the selected Link from the list of possible target Links
a new Link instance - indicates that a new account must be created with the identity specified by the create policy, or manually; in this case, the Link instance returned will have a null nativeIdentity attribute

Argument.Description: A list of the possible target Links.
True if this is not the first assignment.
True if account creation is allowed.

A Link instance that represents the selection. Value can be: null - indicates that no automatic selection can be made Link - the selected Link from the list of possible target Links a new Link instance - indicates that a new account must be created with the identity specified by the create policy, or manually; in this case, the Link instance returned will have a null nativeIdentity attribute

Rule.Source: /******* * * * Generated: Wed Feb 14 13:45:32 EST 2018 * * Rule: Account Selector Template * * Description: Account Selector Template * * Inputs: * * source - The application doing the provisioning. * * role - The IT role being provisioned. * * identity - The target identity. * * application - The target application. * * links - A list of the possible target Links. * * isSecondary - True if this is not the first assignment. * * project - The provisioning project. * * accountRequest - The account request. * * allowCreate - True if account creation is allowed. * * Returns: * * selection - A Link instance that represents the selection. Value can be: * * null - indicates that no automatic selection can be made * * Link - the selected Link from the list of possible target Links * * a new Link instance - indicates that a new account must be created with the identity specified by the * * create policy, or manually; in this case, the Link instance returned will have a null nativeIdentity attribute * ******/ serilog=org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory.getLog("SERI.Rule.accountSelectorTemplate"); serilog.debug("----Rule Start----");
